rules.description: Use a 4 px or 8 px spacing scale for margins, padding, and gaps.
Body text line length should be approximately 45â€“75 characters on desktop.
Pointer targets must be at least 24x24 CSS pixels, with a product preference of 44x44 or larger.
Normal text must have at least 4.5:1 contrast against its background.
Large text must have at least 3:1 contrast against its background.
All interactive elements must have a clearly visible focus indicator with good contrast.
All interactive elements must be reachable and operable with keyboard only.
Form fields must have always-visible labels and not rely solely on placeholders.
Validation error messages must state what is wrong and how to fix it.
Use semantic table markup for tabular data, with headers and scopes defined.
Respect the prefers-reduced-motion setting and disable or minimize non-essential animations when it is enabled.
Async operations longer than about 500 ms must show a loading state (spinner, skeleton, or progress).
Global navigation must clearly indicate the current active section.
